During this introduction course, we will learn the basics of R and how to manipulate data.

Throughout this introduction, we will learn how to use ![](./assets/images/Rlogo.svg){height=1.5em style=margin-bottom;} in ![](./assets/images/RSTUDIO.png){height=1.5em style=margin-bottom;}.

This introduction covers:

- R syntax
  + R as a calculator
  + Variables in R
  + Functions
- Data import using [`readr`](https://readr.tidyverse.org/)
- Pipe the data using [`magrittr`](https://magrittr.tidyverse.org/)
- Tidy the data using [`tidyr`](https://tidyr.tidyverse.org/)
- Arrange the data using [`dplyr`](https://dplyr.tidyverse.org/)
- Visualise the data using [`ggplot2`](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/)



The data we will use are all gathered in the package [`PlanktonData`](https://kmgjan.github.io/PlanktonData/)

----

Install [R](https://ftp.acc.umu.se/mirror/CRAN/) and [R studio](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/) before the start of the course !
